mapper.insert: insert into tcher_trainer(mno, tno, confirm) values(#{mno}, #{tno}, #{confirm});

insert into tcher_trainer(mno, tno, pno, sdt, edt, period, reqdate, wishtime, confirm, writerev) values(#{mno}, #{tno}, #{pno}, #{sdt}, date_add(#{sdt}, interval 30 day), #{period}, now(), #{wishtime}, 0, 0)
insert into alert(othername, mymno, kinds, date, confirm, type, othermno) values(#{othername}, #{mymno}, #{type}, now(), 0, #{typenum}, #{othermno})
mapper.select: select mno, tno from tcher_trainer where mno=#{mno} and tno=#{tno}
select mno, tno from f_like where mno=#{mno} and tno=#{tno}
select * from tcher_trainer where mno=#{mno} and tno=#{tno}

select t.*, date_format(t.reqdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, date_format(t.reqdate, '%h:%i') as time, p.titl, date_format(t.reqdate, '%p') as pm, m.name as mname, m.img as mpic from tcher_trainer t inner join memb m on t.mno = m.mno inner join memb mm on t.tno = mm.mno inner join promotion p on t.pno = p.pno where t.tno = #{no} and t.confirm = 0

select t.*, date_format(t.reqdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, date_format(t.reqdate, '%h:%i') as time, p.titl, date_format(t.reqdate, '%p') as pm, mm.name as tname, mm.img as tpic from tcher_trainer t inner join memb m on t.mno = m.mno inner join memb mm on t.tno = mm.mno inner join promotion p on t.pno = p.pno where t.mno = #{no} and t.confirm = 0
mapper.delete: delete from tcher_trainer where mno=#{mno} and tno=#{tno}
delete from f_like where mno=#{mno} and tno=#{tno}
